about_the_game:
a infinitely large world that can be freely edited
unrestricted boundaries and heights

the currently implemented functions
a simple game scene editor
blocks that can be placed in any position, size, and rotation
you can customize images and sounds
can play local music videos
can simulate physical effects
can be shared in the creative workshop
map size unlimited

future features that will be available
dreams will come true, right?
in the future, there will be a virtual world
we can play inside
perhaps now it's just a simple scene editor
but in the future, it will be a virtual world
this is just a starting point

to be developed
online function
a vast world where players participate, edit, upload, share, and access together
each player has their own editing block
other players can access it

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 兼容 Windows 的音频设备
  • Additional Notes: 支持机械硬盘（HDD），推荐使用固态硬盘（SSD）。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13400
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 4050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 兼容 Windows 的音频设备
  • Additional Notes: 支持机械硬盘（HDD），推荐使用固态硬盘（SSD）。

short_description: a infinitely large world that can be freely edited. unrestricted boundaries and heights. in the future, there will be a virtual world, we can play inside. perhaps now it's just a simple scene editor, but in the future, it will be a virtual world. this is just a starting point.
